mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (prod_no, prod_type, prod_name, prod_content, prod_image, price, prod_quantity, reg_date) VALUES (seq_product_prod_no.NEXTVAL, ${prodType}, #{prodName}, #{prodContent}, #{prodImage}, #{price}, #{prodQuantity}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT prod_no, prod_type, prod_name, prod_content, prod_image, price, prod_quantity, reg_date, delete_flag FROM product WHERE prod_no = #{value}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT prod_no, prod_type, prod_image, prod_name, price FROM product
delete_flag = '0'
AND prod_type = '0'
AND prod_type = '1'
AND prod_name LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY
reg_date DESC
price
price
price DESC ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT prod_no, prod_type, prod_image, prod_name, price, delete_flag FROM product
delete_flag = '0'
AND prod_type = '0'
AND prod_type = '1'
AND prod_name LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
) countTable
